attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: Worst app ever. Very laggy and why so many points?! i would like to meet him to throw a big fat shoe at this hot cheeto bald ass🥰✨

attributes.title: CHILDREN STAY SAFE
attributes.review: this is a horrifying app promoting pedophilia! disgusting behaviour. save the children

attributes.title: This app SUCKS🤮🤮
attributes.review: First of all, it took 30 years to download. Then when I opened the app I had to request the verification code 3 times and it never sent. Normally I love supporting my orange king, but the fact that I couldn’t even log into the app shattered all love I previously had for him. If he doesn’t love me enough to let me on his app then he isn’t worthy of my love at all. Do NOT download this app!!! It will not satisfy your Trumpy needs. Ok and JUST as I was writing this, it finally sent me my verification code 2 hours after I downloaded it. This is ridiculous. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!!

attributes.title: Don’t download this🤢👁👅👁🧚
attributes.review:
This app took me 365 years to download for me. And after that the want my phone number. ✨Like hunny boo boo no✨and second they wanted me to vote🔥I said no bc I’m ✨underaged✨and they threatened to drown my fish! They only update me 1 a year? Like I need to know if trump🎃 is going to make it or not. And they ask me for my address?😑 like if I tell you where I live y’all won’t believe that I live on Saturn 🪐 so you know I didn’t give them my address so they threatened to eat my dog😑👏🏽👏🏽👏🏽👏🏽 like ✨hunny boo boo no✨👏🏽👏🏽👏🏽 👁👄👁 then I was reading everything thing on there and it said “posted 7/8/2020” like they think I mess with 💅🏽time travelers💅🏽👁👅👁 “NO!!” Then it wanted my birthday like I said I’m underaged then still wanted me to vot like👁👄👁
Anyways don’t get this app very bad not worth the time! Btw they might drown your fish 🐠 I had to say bye to my fish Ariel🧜🏻‍♀️🧜🏼‍♀️🧜🏽‍♀️🧜🏾‍♀️🧜🏿‍♀️so yeah like don’t mess with them! Anyways bye got to go eat some Cheetos😙DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!🙌🏻🙌🏼🙌🏽🙌🏾🙌🏿bye loves 😙😘🦶🏼🥨🦶🏼

attributes.title: Worst app ever🤢🤮🤮😬
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded the app a bees nest fell on my head and then I got ran over by a bus followed by Bering but by a snake and drowning in the ocean I also lost my phone and my phone caught a virus I’m in my casket now but someone stole my phone and got it fixed I spoke to them today and they said this app had a curse by all means DO NoT DOWNload as soon as I undosnloaded the app my life went back to normal  so happy will not recommend if I could give 0 stars I definitely would nevermind more like -99999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999899989999999999999999999999999999#genz #tiktok if u know what I mean🥴

attributes.title: This is for Donald
attributes.review: I can’t believe this man has the audacity to put pride march onto his website after he allowed adoption agencies and hospitals to deny LGBTQIA people. Not to mention he has raped many women and yet he criticizes Joe Biden for a false allegation of sexual harassment.He’s also very racist. One example of his racism is when she said that Obama was born in Kenya. Which is very hypocritical because orangutans are obviously born in Borneo or Sumatra.

attributes.title: and now i’m dead😙✌🏼
attributes.review: when i first downloaded this app it asked for my number which was perfectly fine but then i started receiving weird messages from someone claiming to be trump. I didn’t believe anything until he face timed me, he was getting a fake tan to touch up his oranginess🍊and complete his cheeto look🥕and omg it was traumatizing let’s just say....🍤there i believed it was really trump and threatened to kill the family dog, martha by over feeding her some alphabet soup 🍜 this was outrageous and purely evil and i was having none of it and as i was on my way headed to the white house my dog, martha started MALFUNCTIONING it was a robot, part of trumps plan, she went 💞four in her💞 four in her💞while dancing on the bathroom countertop. devastated i called my man friends😏😉 damon salvatore and klaus mikaelson that’s right ladies💅🏻 they are BOTH fighting over me, stay jealous✨✨ we bust in to the white house we find the orange cheeto shrimp🍊🥕🍤 and both klaus and damon r fighting over who gets to kill him to get revenge, trump tries to kill them but forgets they r bad b’s and he can’t kill them✨💅🏻 then boom katerina whom for some reason NEVER DIES EVEN WHEN SHES DEAD busts through the doors, she loves me. were shocked. the petrova b loves no one but her self. we look down to see, she’s holding a white oak stake. we throught they were all burned but no petrovas always find a way. she wants to kill him klaus and damon for me. in that moment of weakness trump starts a song.... it’s go💕go💕go💕go💕go💕 go💕go💕go💕go💕go💕 go💕go💕go💕go💕go💕 go💕go💕go💕go💕go💕 go💕go💕go💕go💕go.... it’s my weakness, i can’t control my self i start moving my legs, i can’t stop. damon then goes into the filing room to conjure up a plan, he sees a file with my name on it, he opens it, the petrova b is my mother, when she gave birth to her child in (me) in 1490 a witch froze me and stopped me from aging till 16 years ago. as damon came out to tell me i was in such shock and umpa lumpa managed to overdose me with chocolate, AN UMPLA LUMPA KILLED ME???? in mad anger klaus and damon, at the same time killed trump one pulled his orange cheeto ass skin of and the other slowly ripped out his uterus, yes that’s right trump turned out to be a girl👱‍♀️👩 that explains so much🍤. all this trouble just for downloading an app and now i am DEAD because of this app. i do NOT recommend.

attributes.title: ALL PRESIDENTS MATTER🧚🏼‍♀️✨🥰
attributes.review:
i downloaded this app in hopes to finally convert myself into a bunker boy orange cheeto racist white supremest loving republican🙈yeahhhhhhh that failed just like his mothers abortion should’ve😀❤️i think trumps gained a few pounds.. maybe he should go on a diet😝🙏🏻without the t🥰every life matters🥵except for Trumps🍊I don’t think he’s America’s biggest mistake😇I think he’s the worlds biggest regret🌏💫God said to love your neighbor🏠guess i’m moving✈️Trump kissed a girl and he liked it👄his rape victims didn’t tho👀Trump could be a model😍for a coffin magazine⚰️It’s so cute when he breathes💦it’d be even cuter if he stopped tho💨Trump really hits different🤤just domestic abuse tho😵Everyone learns from their mistakes💘his mom must’ve really got taught a lesson🗡After all his hard work he should really go on a cruise🛳make it titanic tho🚨🎉I hope this man really loves himself🌈because nobody else should✨Sometimes i get jealous of trump🥺oh sorry i meant Hellen Keller😎He is such a baddie😫without the bad tho🤩He really popped off with this app📱just like the cap to my bleach bottle😵Everyone really is a gift from God🌟too bad his parents didn’t keep his receipt🙁Maybe he needs a nice nap🥇underground🕳Trump should take after hammocks😻and hang himself on a tree👅imagine trump 2020😁😍in a grave😏😋when dory said just keep swimming🐠she wasn’t talking about trump✖️Donald is on top of the world⚡️☄️hopefully he jumps off✨I’m gonna get trump a bath bomb for christmas🎅 it looks just like a toaster🍞Next time i see Trump 2020 i’ll be screaming hell yes😘because it’ll be on your grave stone🤡I hope he runs for president again🤞🏼in hell🔥His words really touch me🖤just like he wants to touch his daughter🍒
Words can’t describe how much i love this man📝but numbers can🧚🏼‍♀️-483929172939382/10✨✨🧚🏼‍♀️Bob ross ssid mistakes are happy accidents🦄Clearly he never met you🎁all these reviews are so mean😭💔now listen to them😳

attributes.title: Download speed
attributes.review: I’ve seen a lot one star reviews purely because the download took over a day. It literally downloaded in seconds for me and the app size is only 39 MB. These people’s WiFi router is literally a rock.
